auth.passportAuthDescription:
Forum ensures one person, one vote through passport verification.
Your data stays on your device using zero-knowledge proofs.
auth.couldNotReadPassport: Could not read passport. Please try again.
auth.enterPassportMrzManually: Enter your passport MRZ details manually.
auth.couldNotAccessNFC: Could not access NFC. Please ensure NFC is enabled and try again.
auth.couldNotNavigateToScanner: Could not navigate to scanner. Please try again.

passport.stepOneOfTwo: Step 1 of 2: Read the Machine Readable Zone (Passport or ID Card)
passport.cameraPermissionMessage: This app needs camera access to scan passport MRZ
passport.cameraPermissionRequired: Camera permission is required to scan MRZ
passport.flatOnTopOfPassport: Flat on top of the passport
passport.closeToPassportChip: Close to the passport chip area
passport.placePhoneOnPassport: Place your phone on top of your passport
passport.keepPassportFlat: Keep the passport flat and steady
passport.waitForDetection: Wait for the NFC chip to be detected
passport.doNotMove: Do not move until reading is complete
passport.name: Name
passport.authenticationFailedMessage: The passport chip rejected the authentication. This usually happens when the MRZ data doesn't match the chip data.
passport.mutualAuthFailedMessage: Could not establish secure communication with the passport chip. The MRZ data might be incorrect.
passport.tagLostMessage: Lost connection with the passport. Please hold the phone steady on the passport.
passport.transceiveFailedMessage: Failed to communicate with the passport chip. Try cleaning the chip area and ensure good contact.
passport.checkMrzData: Double-check the MRZ data (document number, birth date, expiry date)
passport.ensureValidPassport: Ensure this is a valid biometric passport with NFC chip
passport.cleanChip: Clean the passport chip area (back cover)
passport.tryDifferentPosition: Try different phone positions on the passport
passport.noMrzDataReceived: No MRZ data received. Please scan your passport again.
passport.couldNotReadPassportNfc: Could not read passport via NFC. Please try again.
passport.cannotGoBack: Cannot go back. Please restart the app.

voting.voteRecorded: Your vote for "{{option}}" has been recorded
voting.scanPassportToVote: Scan your passport to participate in this vote
voting.webDemoDisabled: Voting is disabled in web demo mode
voting.notEligible: You are not eligible to vote on this proposal
voting.needPassportVerification: You need to verify with your passport to vote
voting.alreadyVoted: You have already voted on this proposal
voting.mobileOnly: Voting is available on mobile devices only

profile.votingHistoryWillAppear: Your voting history will appear here

errors.privacyProofFailed: Failed to generate privacy proof. Please check your passport data.
errors.passportRequired: Passport verification required for voting. Please scan your passport first.
errors.privacyVerificationFailed: Privacy verification failed. Please check your passport data.
errors.voteRecordFailed: Failed to record vote. Please try again.

manual.findInformationOnDocument: Find this information on your document (passport or ID card)
manual.dateOfBirthFormat: Date of birth must be in YYMMDD format (6 digits)
manual.dateOfExpiryFormat: Date of expiry must be in YYMMDD format (6 digits)

instructions.forPassports: For passports: Open to the photo page
instructions.forIdCards: For ID cards: Use the back side (if MRZ is there) or front
instructions.positionCamera: Position camera over the MRZ (2-3 lines of small text)
instructions.holdSteady: Hold steady and wait for automatic detection
instructions.goodLighting: Ensure good lighting for best results
instructions.lookForMrz: Look for MRZ lines like these (passport example):

harmonyos.compatibilityMessage: OCR scanning may not work properly on HarmonyOS devices. The camera scanner might close unexpectedly due to native module compatibility issues. Please try manual entry instead.

proposalCreate.enterCountryCodes: Enter 3-letter country codes separated by commas
proposalCreate.leaveEmptyToAllowAll: Leave empty to allow all countries
proposalCreate.citizensCannotVote: Citizens from these countries cannot vote
proposalCreate.minimumTwoOptions: At least 2 voting options with labels are required
proposalCreate.setValidDeadline: Please set a valid deadline (minimum 1 day)
proposalCreate.minimumTwoOptionsRequired: At least 2 voting options are required
proposalCreate.walletRequired: Wallet is required to create posts
